briefTitle: Effectiveness of BNT162b2 Formulations Using State Vaccine Registry and Insurance Claims Data
officialTitle: Effectiveness of BNT162b2 Formulations Using State Vaccine Registry and Insurance Claims Data

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* People with at least one year of pharmacy and medical enrollment in HealthVerity prior to vaccine availability
* State of California or Louisiana resident for at least one year

Exclusion criteria:

* People currently pregnant,
* Individuals with discrepancies in sex and/or year of birth between HealthVerity claims and California/Louisiana immunization registry datasets
* A diagnosis of COVID-19 in any setting ≤ 90 days prior to start of study or receipt COVID-19 vaccine ≤ 90 days prior to start of study.

primary.description: Number of participants diagnosed with COVID-19 were reported in this outcome measure.
primary.timeFrame: From date of FDA authorization/approval of BNT162b2 until end of follow-up (maximum of 6 months)

secondary.measure: Number of Participants With an Outpatient Encounter
secondary.description: Outpatient encounter was considered as an encounter with International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM) code: U07.1.
secondary.timeFrame: From date of FDA authorization/approval of BNT162b2 until end of follow-up (maximum of 6 months)

secondary.measure: Number of Participants With an Inpatient Encounter
secondary.description: Inpatient encounter was considered as an encounter with ICD-10-CM code: U07.1.
secondary.timeFrame: From date of FDA authorization/approval of BNT162b2 until end of follow-up (maximum of 6 months)

secondary.measure: Number of Participants With Emergency Department Encounter
secondary.description: Number of emergency department encounter was considered as an encounter with ICD-10-CM code: U07.1.
secondary.timeFrame: From date of FDA authorization/approval of BNT162b2 until end of follow-up (maximum of 6 months)

secondary.measure: Number of Participants With COVID-19 Critical Illness
secondary.description: COVID-19 critical illness was defined as intensive care unit \[ICU\] admission, mechanical ventilation, or inpatient death.
secondary.timeFrame: From date of FDA authorization/approval of BNT162b2 until end of follow-up (maximum of 6 months)

secondary.measure: Number of Participants With Non-COVID-19 Respiratory Infection
secondary.description: Non-COVID-19 respiratory infection included: diagnosis of any of pneumonia, respiratory syncytial virus (RSV), rhinovirus and/or receipt of antibiotic prescription.
secondary.timeFrame: From date of FDA authorization/approval of BNT162b2 until end of follow-up (maximum of 6 months)

secondary.measure: Number of Participants With Negative Control Outcomes
secondary.description: Negative outcomes included: accidental injury, ingrown toenail and atopic dermatitis. Number of participants with any negative control outcomes were reported in this outcome measure.
secondary.timeFrame: From date of FDA authorization/approval of BNT162b2 until end of follow-up (maximum of 6 months)

secondary.measure: Total Costs of All-cause Hospitalizations From Administrative Healthcare Claims Dataset
secondary.timeFrame: From 1 month after index date (hospitalization date) until end of follow-up (Up to 4 months)

secondary.description: Average length of stay was defined as date of service end minus date of service start.
secondary.timeFrame: From 1 month after index date (hospitalization date) until end of follow-up (Up to 4 months)

secondary.measure: Number of Participants With ICU Admission Are Included in This Outcome Measure.
secondary.description: Percentage of participants with ICU admission within 30 Days of follow-up are included in this outcome measure.
secondary.timeFrame: From 1 month after index date (hospitalization date) until end of follow-up (Up to 4 months)

secondary.measure: Number of Participants Who Received High-flow Oxygen or Mechanical Ventilation (MV)
secondary.timeFrame: From 1 month after index date (hospitalization date) until end of follow-up (Up to 4 months)

secondary.measure: Number of Participants With Inpatient Mortality
secondary.timeFrame: From 1 month after index date (hospitalization date) until end of follow-up (Up to 4 months)

secondary.measure: Number of Participants Who Received Antiviral Treatment
secondary.description: Number of participants who received antiviral COVID treatment is reported.
secondary.timeFrame: From 1 month after index date (hospitalization date) until end of follow-up (Up to 4 months)

secondary.measure: Mean Cost of All-cause Healthcare From Administrative Healthcare Claims Dataset
secondary.timeFrame: From 1 month after index date (hospitalization date) until end of follow-up (Up to 4 months)

secondary.measure: All-cause Healthcare Resource Utilization as The Total Number of Encounters, Regardless of Setting, Using Data From Administrative Healthcare Claims Dataset
secondary.timeFrame: From 1 month after index date (hospitalization date) until end of follow-up (Up to 4 months)

secondary.measure: Number of Participants With COVID-19-Related Hospitalization
secondary.timeFrame: From 1 month after index date (hospitalization date) until end of follow-up (Up to 4 months)
